definition: Napoli, capital of Campania region of Italy/Naples
that/those/then (in that case)/commonly pr. [nei4] before a classifier, esp. in Beijing
to rein in/to compel/to force/to carve/to engrave/(literary) to command/to lead/bridle/(physics) abbr. for 勒克斯[le4 ke4 si1], lux
Slovakia/Slovak/abbr. for 斯洛伐克[Si1 luo4 fa2 ke4]

pinyin: Na4 bu4 le4 si1 wang2 guo2

sentences.chinese: 到過那不勒斯死而無憾，對嗎？

sentences.english: I reiterate that my wish is to remain at Napoli.
sentences.chinese: 我再次重申我希望能夠留在那不勒斯。

sentences.english: Napoli is an end point and not a springboard for Cavani.
sentences.chinese: 那不勒斯將會是卡瓦尼的重點，而非跳板。

sentences.english: We broke our journey at Naples.
The Camorra, a larger and older group than the Sicilian Mafia, have controlled the industry in Naples for about 25 years.
sentences.chinese: 科莫拉組織已經控制那不勒斯已經有25年了。

sentences.english: Felt throughout Sicily and north to Naples and Campobasso.
sentences.chinese: 認爲整個西西里島和北那不勒斯和坎帕巴索。

sentences.english: He will stay at Napoli, like Mazzarri, and he will improve further.
sentences.chinese: 他會停留在那不勒斯，喜歡馬紮裏，他會進一步提高。
到過那不勒斯，死而無憾。

sentences.english: The two met at Teano, a little north of Naples.
sentences.chinese: 兩支隊伍在那不勒斯稍北的泰阿諾會師。

sentences.english: The Neapolitan fans had with Diego a relationship based on affection and love, honoring him as a God.
sentences.chinese: 他贏得了那不勒斯隊球迷們的愛戴，稱他爲足球之神。

sentences.english: One attack on Naples , Italy dropped 6400 kg of bombs.
sentences.chinese: 一個攻擊那不勒斯，意大利下降六四零零千克炸彈。

sentences.english: Make Napl es the capital of Italy.
sentences.chinese: 讓那不勒斯成爲意大利的首都吧。

sentences.english: She - she wanted to paint the Bay of Naples some day.
sentences.chinese: 她她希望有一天能夠去畫那不勒斯的海灣。

sentences.english: He opted to go to Naples.
sentences.chinese: 他選擇了去到那不勒斯。

sentences.english: Vincenzo Montella has rued never being able to pull on the Azzurri shirt of Napoli.
sentences.chinese: 文森佐蒙特拉後悔沒能穿上那不勒斯的球衣。

sentences.english: I have been to Naples and die.
sentences.chinese: 我去過那不勒斯，死而無悔。
